Posts.Content: bassadict69 wrote: Mom had surgery today and is in a room resting quietly. The surgery went well although the surgeon updated up in the middle of surgery telling us he would have to remove all the axillary lymph nodes on one side. That is worrisome! He said we should have a stage on Monday and no more as far as further treatment that is needed, etc. Â  Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Surgery today! bassadict69 Ariom
